    • fixAllProjects

      public static <T extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo> T fixAllProjects(T mojo) throws IllegalAccessException

      MojoRule#lookupConfiguredMojo(File, String) does not initialise MavenSession.getAllProjects(), which leads to NullPointerExceptions.

      This method simply fixes that by setting it as equal to MavenSession.getProjects() using reflection.

      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the mojo
      Parameters:
      mojo - mojo to fix
      Returns:
      reconfigured mojo (with the session::allProjects fixed
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - thrown if reflection operations fail

    • createMavenSession

      public static org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession createMavenSession(org.codehaus.plexus.PlexusContainer container, TestUtils.CheckedFunction<File, org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject> projectReader, Path baseDir, String... modules)

      Creates a MavenSession object for a session spanning multiple projects. The project names are provided as the variable-list arguments.

      The listed modules will be listed in MavenSession.getProjects().

      If the reactor root (baseDir) contains a pom.xml file, a separate project will be loaded for it it will be added to MavenSession.getAllProjects() on top of the listed modules.

      Otherwise, MavenSession.getAllProjects() will be empty.

      The first argument can be obtained by e.g. using MojoRule::getContainer, if using Maven Testing Harness.

      The second argument is a function producing a MavenProject instance based on the pom.xml file. If using Maven Testing Harness, this can be the result of MojoRule::readMavenProject.

      Parameters:
      container - PlexusContainer instance
      projectReader - a TestUtils.CheckedFunction<File, org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject> which reads the project given the file name
      baseDir - parent directory to all modules on the modules list
      modules - string array listing all modules that are to be part of the session
      Returns:
      an initialised MavenSession object with the listed projects on the project list
